resources:
Lights Out> Lights Out Help light logo light logo
Lights Out is a classic puzzle game that challenges players to turn off all the lights on a grid. To play, start with a grid of lights, some of which are on and some are off. The goal is to turn off all the lights, but there\'s a catch: when you press a light to toggle it, it also affects the adjacent lights, switching them from on to off or vice versa. The puzzle begins with a predetermined pattern of lights, and your task is to find the right sequence of moves to turn them all off. As you progress through the levels, the patterns become more complex, requiring strategic thinking and careful planning to solve. The ultimate objective is to find the minimum number of moves to extinguish all the lights. Lights Out is a mentally stimulating and addictive game that challenges your problem-solving skills. You Solved it! Play again and find out if you can solve it in even less moves! About Me I am a senior in CS. I enjoy programing fun android games. They make for great projects. Please enjoy the app! Settings Choose a color Red Yellow Orange Moves: New Game light bulb
